title: Project-Based API Web Developer
job_overview:
We are a dynamic marketing agency seeking a talented API/Web Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development across platforms like WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, and other web design tools. You'll play a pivotal role in building, integrating, and maintaining API connections and web solutions that enhance our clients' digital presence.

Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain websites using WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, and similar platforms.
Design, build, and manage API integrations to streamline workflows and enhance functionality.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues across various web platforms and APIs.
Collaborate with the marketing team to implement user-friendly, SEO-optimized, and high-performing websites.
Ensure all web solutions are mobile-responsive, secure, and optimized for performance.
Stay updated with industry trends, new technologies, and platform updates.

Requirements:
Experience: At least 3 years of experience in web development, with a portfolio of work across different platforms.
Technical Skills: Expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experience with API integration and RESTful services.
Platform Expertise: Ability to work with WordPress (custom themes/plugins preferred), Wix, Squarespace, and other similar tools.
Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills.
Attention to Detail: Deliver pixel-perfect, user-friendly designs.
Communication: Strong team player who effectively collaborates with cross-functional teams.

Bonus: Familiarity with some marketing automation tools, CRM systems, or web analytics platforms.
